 2022-00022022-01-04,  ,  ,  ,  PMO
ActDepartment of Public Works and Government Services Act
PrecisAppointment of PAUL THOMPSON of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Deputy Minister of Public Works and Government Services, to be styled Deputy Minister of Public Services and Procurement, to hold office during pleasure, effective January 11, 2022.
